popup.abrHint: You can change MP3 conversion under "Settings → Advanced → Conversion Policy".
popup.popupLint: Click the resource you need, then choose its options.

dashHint.name: About DASH / FLV / MP4
dashHint.desc: Do not change these settings casually. If you really need to, read {0} first and make sure you know what you are doing.

error.risk: Risk control was triggered. Please complete verification.
error.checkUpdate: Please check the latest version on GitHub.
error.selectLimit: Selecting more than 30 items at once is not recommended.
error.skipTask: Task {0} has no {1}. Skipping this subtask.

updater.title: New version available!
updater.hint: You can disable "Auto Check Updates" under "Settings → General", but this is not recommended.

search.input: {0} link / AV / BV / SS / EP / AU / AM / SID / FID ...
search.suggest: What would you like to search for today?

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

clipboard.name: Clipboard Monitor
clipboard.desc: If enabled, the app will automatically detect and search Bilibili links in your clipboard.

drag_search.name: Drag & Drop Monitor
drag_search.desc: If enabled, dragging a Bilibili link into the app will trigger an automatic search.

notify.name: Notifications
notify.desc: If enabled, a system notification will be sent when a download finishes.

auto_download.name: Auto Start Download
auto_download.desc: If enabled, downloads will start automatically after tasks are added.

paths.name: Paths
paths.desc: "Temp Files" store unfinished downloads; after processing, they are moved to "Output Files".

sidecar.name: Custom Executable Paths
sidecar.desc: Here you can customize paths for each Sidecar. Make sure permissions are correct. Takes effect after restart.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: The database stores settings, login information, download records, and other data.

database.name: Database
database.desc: You can back up and restore the database here.

default.name: Default Parameters
default.desc: These parameters are preferred when downloading. If the resource does not support them, the highest supported option will be used instead.

max_conc.name: Max Concurrent Downloads
max_conc.desc: Controls how many tasks are processed at the same time. Higher values may increase the chance of risk control being triggered.

speed_limit.name: Speed Limit
speed_limit.desc: Set the maximum download speed in KiB/s. Enter 0 for no limit. Takes effect after restart.

add_metadata.name: Embed Metadata into Video & Audio
add_metadata.desc: If enabled, metadata will be embedded automatically when downloading video or audio files.

block_pcdn.name: Try Blocking PCDN
block_pcdn.desc: If enabled, the app will try to use higher-quality links instead of PCDN.

danmaku.name: Convert XML Danmaku to ASS
danmaku.desc: If enabled, DanmakuFactory will be used to convert XML danmaku to ASS when downloading.

mp3.name: Convert Audio to MP3
mp3.desc: If enabled, audio files will be forcibly converted to MP3. Video & audio combined streams are not affected.

mp4.name: Convert Video to MP4
mp4.desc: If enabled, video will be forcibly converted to MP4, and the audio track will be converted to AAC.

naming.name: Naming Format
naming.desc:
Click the corresponding buttons to insert variables. If a resource does not support a variable, that field will be left empty.
Time variables support {format} formatting, for example: {example}

info.title: About
info.paid: This software is a free public project. If you paid for it, you may have been scammed.
info.star: If you find this project useful, please consider giving it a Star on GitHub!
info.data: All data that needs to be persisted is stored locally on your device in plain text.
